title: Professional Farmer 2014 [MULTI10][TiNYiSO]

Tractors and agricultural machines keep your farm running
PC Simulator "Professional Farmer 2014 " takes the player to the field and provides fans farmers full control from the comfort of their homes. Farm management , cultivation fields , planting crops , livestock and the sale of agricultural production are some of the main elements provided by this simulator.

From a small property , the player begins his career as a farmer with future and gradually acquires new fields , tractors, and animals, and can specialize or use all that agriculture provides . The key to success lies in planning the season well , use the expertise acquired during the game and work hard and skillfully in the traditional way. As a farmer , the player learns to cope with the forces of nature, to accept the climate and respond to it in a way that allows you to improve the performance of the fields , care for animals and prepare the budget for new investments. The player has at his disposal many tractors and agricultural machinery ( combines, forage , enclosed trailers combine parties , etc.). Known manufacturers to grow the farm and manage work. Just good planning and hard work become uncultivated land into a fertile soil and flourishing . Of course you can drive and control all the machines on your own , whether it be plowing , refuel the tractor or download harvest.

"Professional Farmer 2014 " offers a wide variety of crops, depending on the environment and climate , with which the player can grow fields as diverse , effective and high performance. To crop rotation has an important role in the planning ! Integrated seasons influence the game and give the player a constant flow of tasks and jobs.

The local farmers market is your first step to success ! After a short period of time , you should bring the products we grow and harvest on our farm to market and sell to get your first profit . The more bands , best machines have in your fleet and can increase the yield of your crops . Gradually, even you can build new buildings and acquire more fields.

Are you ready to start your farm life ? Sobegins a career in your own farm with Farmer Professional 2014.

Platform: PC

Genre: Simulation
